title: @KateyKhaos, Syndra recall bug
body:
Hey Katey,
i'm here yet again to complain about a Syndra bug. :) 
Are you aware that the recall animation of Syndra's classic skin is broken?

replies.body: We are aware of the issue! It's on our plate of things to fix, but unfortunately at the moment, is not top priority.
Sorry for the wicked long wait/update. We're looking to (finally) have this solved for next patch!
I know that I'm definitely not Katey, but could you show a video/gif of the bug happening?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sSe2H-u-JEw

You see the bug at 14:05 . Syndra goes into her recall pose jumps up and goes to recall pose again.
